node.title: The world's biggest shopping event starts tomorrow. Here's what you need to know
node.alt: A screen shows the value of goods being transacted during Alibaba Group's Singles' Day global shopping festival
node.description: Selling more goods than Black Friday and Cyber Monday combined, China's "anti-Valentine's Day" has transformed from a movement dedicated to singles'Â self-care into the world's largest 24-hour shopping spree.
node.content:
["Selling more goods than Black Friday and Cyber Monday combined, China's \"anti-Valentine's Day\" has transformed from a movement dedicated to singles'\u00a0self-care into the world's largest 24-hour shopping spree.", "Not even China's\u00a0e-commerce billionaire Jack Ma, who catapulted Singles' Day into the online space, would have imagined that a festival that originated as\u00a0a fringe university cultural event would end up reshaping\u00a0shopping habits globally.", "These days even houses are sold at heavily-discounted prices amid the frenzied\u00a0Singles' Day hype.\u00a0", "", "
Millions of Chinese shoppers are expected to compete for bargains on Singles' Day.(Reuters: Jason Lee)
", "Australian companies have jumped on\u00a0the shopping bonanza bandwagon too, targeting Chinese shoppers who last year reportedly\u00a0spent more than\u00a0$1 billion\u00a0on Australian goods in\u00a0the event's first 24 hours.", "So what's all the hype about, and\u00a0how did the once-humble university Bachelors' Day evolve into the massive 11.11 Global Shopping Festival?\u00a0", "
How does China celebrate Singles' Day?
", "China's\u00a0Singles' Day was a kind of \"anti-Valentine's Day\" movement popularised among university students in the 1990s.\u00a0", "Originally known as Bachelors Day, the date, November 11 (or 11.11),\u00a0was chosen to\u00a0represent \"single sticks\" or \"bare sticks\", which is\u00a0Chinese slang for\u00a0bachelors.", "Traditionally youngsters, mainly university students, celebrated the notion of self-care\u00a0by\u00a0buying themselves presents, fine meals and having a\u00a0night out with friends.", "They would pay for themselves to demonstrate their independence.", "But then,\u00a0businesses spotted the opportunity to sell more products and began marking the day\u00a0with special discounts.", "It was a fairly insignificant shopping event until Mr Ma brought the Singles' Day sales strategy to Alibaba Group's giant online marketplace Tmall, offering heavy discounts on the platform in 2009.", "The online shopping space sparked new ways to grab the attention of all kinds of shoppers \u2013\u00a0and not only through big discounts \u2013\u00a0creating\u00a0tremendous sales spikes within hours.", "During 2020's Singles' Day, Alibaba and e-commerce giantJD.com set records, racking\u00a0up around $155 billion in sales across their platforms.\u00a0", "In the first hour alone, nearly\u00a0330,000 items were sold on Alibaba with shoppers eager to nab deals on\u00a0apartments, luxury bags, appliances, daily necessities, and cars.", "
What can you buy on Singles' Day?
", "While the main event is the 24-hour shopping window on November 11, in recent years Singles' Day pre-sales have kicked off as early as\u00a0October 1, coinciding with\u00a0China's National Day and the Golden Week holiday period.\u00a0", "New technology has\u00a0also changed the way in which shoppers are being lured into deals, with celebrity influencers spruiking products in livestreaming events.", "Alibaba fuels the\u00a0shopping hype with\u00a0sales metrics ticking over live on a scoreboard on their website and in their live gala event.", "", "
Clothes, skincare products and home appliances were among the most popular items,\u00a0\u00a0according to Alibaba.(Xinhua via AFP)
", "On October 20, Li Jiaqi\u00a0\u2013\u00a0the \"Lipstick King\" of China who has close to 55 million fans on Douyin,\u00a0China's version of TikTok\u00a0\u2013 sold more than 10 billion yuan ($2 billion) worth of goods in 12 hours on Tmall.", "According to local media, 200 million viewers watched Tmall's Singles' Day livestreaming pre-sale event.", "Shoppers flocked to Mr Li's livestreaming chatroom for\u00a0special discounts and random free giveaways of luxury skincare products.", "From rice to houses,\u00a0and goods to services, people can shop for almost everything and anything in the Singles' Day sales.", "", "
Businesses use influential live streamers to spruik\u00a0their products on Singles' Day.(Wang Xiao/Chengdu Economic Daily via Reuters)
", "According to Alibaba, last year clothes, skincare products, dairy products and home appliances were among some of the top selling items.\u00a0", "Lisa Wang, who runs\u00a0an art school for young children in Beijing, uses Singles' Day to promote special offers through\u00a0WeChat.", "\"It is a hobby for Chinese consumers to seek special discounts during Singles' Day. Our students' parents will ask for a tuition fee discount during the Singles' Day sale,\" she told the ABC.", "
Is it just about shopping?
", "The simple answer is no.", "Apart from shopping, cultural events are also organised for the night of November 11.", "Several e-commerce platforms organise dazzling live gala shows, which have\u00a0featured pop stars including Taylor Swift and\u00a0Pharrell Williams in previous years.", "The shows are broadcast on international satellite TVs and online streaming platforms, which attract billions of viewers.", "", "
Taylor Swift performed at the 11.11 Countdown Gala in Shanghai, China in 2019.(Supplied: Alibaba)
", "In 2020, Katy Perry sent a pre-recorded video to one of the gala shows in China to celebrate Singles' Day.", "\"OMG! It was Katy Perry's first show after giving birth!\" local media reported.", "With the massive discounts and celebrity\u00a0promotions, Singles' Day is not only for Chinese consumers anymore.", "Lazada, an e-commerce platform affiliated with Alibaba, has brought Singles' Day into South-East Asia.", "It successfully duplicated the model of China's gala shows in Thailand, and sponsored a prize trip to the\u00a0NASA facilities in Florida as part of a sales promotion in Singapore.", "
Can Singles' Day discounts be enjoyed in Australia?
", "Even against the backdrop of COVID-19 and ongoing trade wars, the sheer market scale and strong demand for high-quality products in China saw Australian companies last year generate\u00a0more than $1 billion in sales.", "", "
Australian supplements and dairy products are popular with Chinese consumers.(ABC News)
", "That success has inspired other Australian retailers to tap into the Singles' Day market.\u00a0", "UMall, a shopping app that serves the Chinese-Australian community, has mimicked the Singles' Day sales with shopping coupons.", "Manufactures like Dyson Australia also launched Singles' Day promotions earlier this week.", "Meanwhile, David Jones announced\u00a0in a WeChat post that\u00a0it would having\u00a0a Singles' Day livestreaming event.", "A David Jones spokesperson told the ABC in a statement that they were focusing on \"the domestic Chinese consumer who is interested in and buying luxury products\".", "
Why are Chinese shoppers buying so much stuff?
", "", "
Experts warn some\u00a0consumers may be suffering from compulsive buying disorder.(Pexel: Amina Filkins)
", "For many shoppers, impulse spending led by the fanatical consumer culture can be irresistible.", "Some Chinese shoppers have expressed regret over their shopping sprees,\u00a0joking\u00a0about \"chopping hands\" to stop them from buying impulse purchases\u00a0next time.", "Yang Jianlan, a psychologist,\u00a0wrote an article for the state-run Xinhua News Agency\u00a0warning that\u00a0consumers may be suffering from compulsive buying disorder caused by \"negative emotions\".", "Ms Wang has also witnessed the effect of \"crazy buying behaviour\", saying young people\u00a0might be\u00a0using\u00a0Singles' Day to relieve life's\u00a0pressures.", "\"Shopping in such a crazy way might be a way to keep stress at bay [and to] reward themselves.\"", "However, she believes that Singles' Day will continue to be a long-term cultural and business event.", "\"Singles' Day has been brought on by a technology evolution,\" she said.\u00a0", "\"Not only us, the millennials, are shopping on Singles' Day. My kids and parents are doing the same.\""]
